topics.body:
*The narrator is here, he was always here, but didn't say a word because he currently is suffering from the common flu, and is in his bed, drinking some tea which still tasted terrible but was good for his health.*

*Though, he is strong willed and charming, keeping himself from sleeping as the time is not right and would easily break his sleeping schedule. But enough about me, a dinosaur just tried to kill everyone and everything, including my favourite toy, the Furbies. The heroes battled against the large omnisexual predator with everything they got, even the XCom Squad came to help and is probably currently cutting him openn to find the kryptonite that was stuck in his pancreas. Fortunately, it was not poisonous or else we might have a zombie dinosaur outbreak with laser eyes, bullet proof skin, flight and X-ray vision.*

*I do not want to live in a world like that, but that isn't really my problem.*

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53911f2f6368723784640100#post_53911f2f6368723784640100
*The charming and beautiful narrator, which is me, feels a bit sick but he is strong and chose not to sleep in the morning as it would break his sleeping schedule which would later give him problems worst than what he has now.*

*Though, his mind is still as strong as it always has, filled with crazy imaginative ideas and plots such as a a mechanized shark controlled by a monkey, terrorizing the streets with its vicious teeth and rocket launchers, under the command of a Russian house plant with a fedora, moustache and a cigar stuck to its roots.*

*That was not the craziest idea he had.*
